      • EEA

        public static int[] EEA(int a,
        int b)
        Algorithm EEA (Extended Euclidean algorithm)
        Parameters:
        a - an (> 0) integer
        b - another (>= 0) integer
        Returns:
        int array (u,v) satisfying u*a + v*b = gcd(a,b)

      • PLDA

        public static int[][] PLDA(int[] nX,
           int[] dX,
           int p)
        PLDA (Polynomial long division algorithm) over GF(p)
        Parameters:
        n(x) - a polynomial
        d(x) - a non-zero polynomial
        p - a prime number
        Returns:
        quotient q(x) and remainder r(x) such that n(x) = q(x)*d(x) + r(x) mod p where deg(r(x)) < deg(d(x))

      • leadDivision

        public static int[] leadDivision(int[] rX,
                 int[] dX)

      • EEAP

        public static int[][] EEAP(int[] aX,
           int[] bX,
           int p)
        EEAP (Extended Euclidean Algorithm for Polynomials) over GF(p)
        Parameters:
        a(x) - a polynomial
        b(x) - another polynomial
        p - a prime number
        Returns:
        polynomial array (u(x),v(x)) satisfying u(x)*a(x) + v(x)*b(x) = gcd(a(x),b(x)) mod p

        public static void outputFile(java.lang.String outputString)
